title: Handle Retailer Inquiry about Shipping Delay
description: A retailer calls to ask why their recent order has not yet shipped.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order in the system.

tasks.description: Check the status of the order and find that it is on hold due to a backordered item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific item that is holding up the entire order.

tasks.description: Inform the retailer about the backordered item and provide the expected in-stock date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the situation to the customer.

tasks.description: Offer to split the shipment so the in-stock items can ship immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The retailer agrees, and the agent modifies the order to create a partial shipment.
